meanings.definition: A toxic glycoalkaloid found in plants of the nightshade family.
meanings.sent1: The doctor warned about the dangers of solanins in certain vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the effects of solanins on human health.
meanings.sent3: Eating too many solanins could turn you into a vegetable yourself!
meanings.sent4: The solanins lurking in the plants were like silent assassins.
meanings.sent5: The vivid green color of solanins served as a warning in nature.

meanings.sent1: The market sold various vegetables containing solanins.
meanings.sent2: The chefs were careful to remove any solanins from the potatoes.
meanings.sent3: The solanins in the garden seemed to be having a party of their own!
meanings.sent4: The solanins spread across the field like a carpet of danger.
meanings.sent5: The smell of solanins filled the air, making everyone cautious.
